986252934634790914.text:
For the first time in 32 years, #taxday is a day to celebrate! 

Out with the old, in with the new (simpler, fairer) tax code.

986252733429710854.text: The #taxcutsandjobsact repeals Obamacare’s unpopular and ineffective individual mandate. You will no longer be forced to buy health insurance you don’t want, don’t need, or can’t afford. You have the FREEDOM to buy the health care plan that’s right for you.

986252593155407873.text: The #taxcutsandjobsact will simplify taxes, with nearly 9 out of 10 Americans filing on a much simpler and more straightforward form.

986252489300283392.text: The #taxcutsandjobsact DOUBLED the child tax credit to help families across the country. It also preserves the Child and Dependent Care Tax Credit and the Adoption tax credit.

986252357968257024.text: The #taxcutsandjobsact nearly DOUBLED the standard deduction, protecting more of your paycheck from taxes and simplifying the filing process.

986252255790882817.text: The #taxcutsandjobsact helps Americans keep more of their hard-earned money to save or spend as they see fit. An average family of four in Missouri-03 will see a tax savings of $2,055!

986252045199044611.text: Missourians deserve better than a complicated and outdated tax code. Thankfully, we FIXED IT! Next year, hardworking families in Missouri and across the nation will find #taxday to be simpler and less time consuming. https://t.co/nvDrKxFvzK

985976227042414592.text:
Tomorrow is the LAST day of our complicated and outdated tax code!
